mapper.insert: insert into stocktrade.trade (user_id, stock_id, sale_person_id, trade_size, trade_date, trade_time, trade_type, trade_method,trade_per_price) values (${user_id}, ${stock_id}, ${sale_person_id}, ${trade_size}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), ${trade_type}, ${trade_method}, ${trade_per_price})
mapper.select: select trade.trade_date as date, user.username as clientName, trade.trade_type as clientSide, stock.stock_name as ticker, stock.RIC as ric, trade.trade_size as size, trade.trade_per_price as price, stock_type.type as currency, issuer_sector.issuer_sector_name as sector, sale_person.person_name as salesperson, trade.trade_method as hp from stocktrade.user, stocktrade.trade, stocktrade.stock, stocktrade.stock_type, stocktrade.issuer_sector, stocktrade.sale_person where trade.stock_id = stock.stock_id and trade.user_id = user.user_id and trade.sale_person_id = sale_person.sale_person_id and stock.issuer_sector_id = issuer_sector.issuer_sector_id and stock.type_id = stock_type.type_id and trade.trade_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select date_data.data_date as date, date_data.buy_num as buyNum, date_data.sell_num as sellNum from stocktrade.date_data where date_data.data_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
